block.code: var req = http.get(final_download_url, function(response) {|console.log('Downloading binaries from ' + final_download_url + ' to ' + path.join(ROOT_FOLDER, TARBALL_FILE_NAME));|if (response.statusCode != 200) {|console.log('ERROR: Unable to download ' + TARBALL_FILE_NAME + ' from ' + final_download_url);|process.exit(1);|}|response.pipe(file);|file.on('finish', function() {|console.log('Download finished.');|file.close();|installPackage();|});|}).on('error', function(e) {|console.log('Got an error: ' + e.message);|});
